attributes.additional_details:
I am a 46 year old Man That still hasnt Learned maths but yet I know for certain what corruption is and the effect it has.
sadly corruption has long spread throughout the uk government and the effect it has can be seen and felt especially in poor areas of Britain.
This must be stopped asap.
UK Government is meant to be Honest and trustworthy not sly and crooked.
They are meant to help not Hurt the public
while helping each other in sly crooked ways.
